block.p: Kerry Abrams, a daughter of Linda and Archie Abrams of Lake Success, N.Y., was married on Thursday to Neil Scott Glass, the son of Zelda and Robert Glass of Fort Lee, N.J. Rabbi Jeremiah Wohlberg officiated at the Swan Club in Roslyn, N.Y.

Kerry Abrams, a daughter of Linda and Archie Abrams of Lake Success, N.Y., was married on Thursday to Neil Scott Glass, the son of Zelda and Robert Glass of Fort Lee, N.J. Rabbi Jeremiah Wohlberg officiated at the Swan Club in Roslyn, N.Y.

Mrs. Glass, 27, is an art therapist at the Hebrew Home for the Aged in Riverdale, the Bronx. She graduated from Rutgers University and received a master's degree in art therapy from Pratt Institute. Her father is the chief financial officer at Wascomat, a distributor of commercial appliances in Inwood, N.Y. Her mother teaches at the Great Neck Art Center.

Mr. Glass, 26, graduated from Williams College and is a candidate for an M.B.A. from New York University. His mother is a fund-raising consultant, in Fort Lee, for nonprofit organizations. His father is the president of Loehmann's, the clothing chain based in the Bronx.
